stories.text: I recently joined an enterprise software startup as a marketing specialist. Being kind of new to the tech world, I'm trying to find the most relevant and credible contents for my daily read to navigate developer culture. So, seeking help here from HN community: what is your favorite publication/platform for quality read? It would be super helpful if you could state your job function as well. Million thanks!
stories.title: Ask HN: Go-To Source for AI/ML and Big Data Read?
Configuring Transfer Hostnames for Faspex and Shares

stories.text:
When I build something, I usually do a Show HN and sometimes get a lot of attention.

Product Hunt is supposed to be similar, right?

But when I post something over there, it seems to just go into a black hole and disappear. There is no "new posts" page or anything. How is anyone finding out about new posts on Product Hunt? How do posts over there get their first upvotes?
stories.title: Product Hunt is a mystery to me
Verizon Text Message from Yourself Scam
Samsung announces M8 smart monitor series
I built a real-time stock app with Python and Fast API, Next.js, and Redis Stack
Industries Stymied Justice for Young Lead Paint Victims
